entry.dcterms:description: 1. Public judgement of the current political situation 2. ISSP 2004 - Citizenship: civil rights and duties, political efficiency, trust in the institutions of democracy, political participation, judgement of the operation of democracy, perception of corruption 3. Public opinions about the 5 December 2004 referendum, 4. Risk, trust and involvment in the Hungarian economy and society: network of social relations, savings, credit card use, online purchase, e-banking, territorial and social mobility 5. CEORG: judgement of health care, satisfaction with the health care system
